website_summaries.verdict: This multi-room play tent gives kids plenty of space to burn off energy. Just watch for exposed wires if play gets too rough.
pros: Six pieces to explore, including two crawl tunnels, three tent rooms, and a basketball hoop
Breathable mesh and soft fabric make it safer for babies
Easy to set up, fold, and store
Meets and exceeds all CPSC Toy Safety Guidelines for the USA
cons: Balls for ball pit not included
Some reports of not all the boxes arriving
Be sure to check for exposed wires after particularly rough play

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: My pup loves it!!!!!!! We shall see how long it lasts. But so far it’s amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Celine Wang

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces.  Definitely not what was expected.
customer_reviews.text: I am very unhappy. I bought this for my 2 year old and it says it is a 6 piece tent which includes box tent, regular tent, basketball hoop ball pit and 2 tunnels. It specifically says that is what’s included. I only got the basketball hoop ball pit, 1 tunnel, and the regular ten. There should be a box tent and also another tunnel. I am missing stuff. I am not very happy about this.
customer_reviews.author: David nakoneczny

customer_reviews.title: Does not contain 6 pieces!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a Christmas gift and it came without the square tent and a tunnel. Amazon was great and set up a return for me and I ordered another. The second came the same way! It does not contain 6 pieces. So disappointed. I'd like all of the pieces but not willing to ordered another. Amazon, please fix this issue for the next buyer. The three pieces are not worth what the 6 cost.
customer_reviews.author: Huffzoo

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a little over a month now and it is incredibly easy to put up and take down. It all folds flat, too, so storage is also a breeze. We usually only play with one piece at a time, but it does connect nicely and easily. It's also really nice that the openings all close with velcro, so the balls don't spill out every where. My two year old plays very rough with it and we play with it every day. The tent got a little bent for a few days but it popped itself back into place. It's definitely holds up a lot better than it looks like it would.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Very Fun, Larger than Expected!
customer_reviews.text: This takes up a large portion of our daughter's room, which is a good thing for us! Overall, it's very well made and set up is quick! The only draw backs are: 1. The parts hook in with a hook and eye type button, but it isn't very secure and the balls fall out from in between the sections. I think a zipper would be a better solution to keep it together. 2. You can't seal off the ball pit without unhooking it from the tube. Other than that, my daughter loves it and it's really great! The ball pit is big enough for an adult to play in it with their kids. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ShawnaHall

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: Brought this and a bounce house for my grandson. Needless to say my grandson was enjoying this more than the bounce house. Looking for additional pieces to add on so he has more to explore and enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy B.

customer_reviews.title: Best value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for our son's birthday knowing all three of our kids would play with it. Not a day goes by where this doesn't get used multiple times. A lot of toys lose their luster after a day or a week, but it's been a month and they still want to play with it when they get home. We purchased a set of 200 balls to go in the ball pit area and that's been a perfect amount. The Velcro spots to flaps open or closed work really great. Despite lots of abuse from three young children, there haven't been any rips or tears.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Isom

customer_reviews.title: Great Value..
customer_reviews.text: You cannot do better for the price. All of these tension fabric play places are generally the same, but the Playz 6 Piece has the best value due to its price. I do wish there was a better attachment mechanism to the tunnels, as our little dog gets very curious/jealous and pokes his head and then makes enough space to get inside as he wishes instead of keeping the baby and the dog separate. However that is my individual concern. I will continue to buy their products and my child enjoys it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Vik

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fun for little ones
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kids for Christmas. They both love it. The quality seems good, it has held up to an 18 month old and 4 year old playing on a daily basis. I would have given it 5 stars, but for some reason the loops on the square tents opening are not aligned with the other tents loops, which means we can't hook the tunnels up to both at the same time. The ball pit is a good size for both of my kids and they are generally pretty large for their ages. I love that the whole thing folds down flat! It makes for super easy storage! Set up and take down are a breeeeeeeeze!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved it! I bought it for Christmas and I really liked the cookies and size. They don't come with the plastic balls but it's still a good price.
customer_reviews.author: VNessaRJ

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: I just received the item today and my kids love it. So far it has kept them busy for the last few hours. I also bought several new balls for it to make it more complete. It's bigger than I thought and overall I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: The Guy

customer_reviews.title: Grandson’s LOVE this!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this play tent for 1 1/2 years now and it’s still awesome. My 2 1/2 year old grandson still loves it and now his little 9month old brother loves it too. He aways says let’s go to G-ma’s house and play in my tent. It took me a few times to figure out how to fit it back in the little bag it comes in, but now I’m a pro. Great big toy and tiny little storage. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy B Hawes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is so great. My daughter loves it. Wish it came with the balls but easy to use and can be indoor or outdoor. At first my daughter didn't like the tunnel but now she loves it. Her favorite is the ball pit with the basketball hoop. I like that it comes in pieces so you don't have to have it all up at once
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Nice Play Set
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandsons ages 28 months and 1 year old. They enjoy playing in it. Easy to set up and haven’t had any issues for the few months we’ve had it.
customer_reviews.author: ShellyRhew

customer_reviews.title: Great Price - Fold up and Store Easily!
customer_reviews.text: This three-piece set folds up so nicely! I can't believe that such a large play item can be stored so easily. My 15-month-old absolutely loved this since the day it arrived! I also love that it can be taken apart and used separately. We've even put pillows and blankets inside as a fort instead of balls. Awesome! This is so worth the price we paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the toddler happy!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves it! We homeschool and set it up to entertain my toddler while I work with my older kids. It would be a fun for a crawler up to preschool. It is kind of big but we don’t always bring out all the pieces, when it cools down we will probably set it up outside in the grass for playtime. All the pieces do fold up for storage which is great, I would say this is one of those things you keep in the closet and pull out when you need your toddler occupied for a bit.
customer_reviews.author: NCH

customer_reviews.title: Decent product. Could use some tweaking!
customer_reviews.text: I did my research to find the best possible product for my almost two-year-old. I looked up all possible play tent tunnel and ran across this one with great reviews and decided to give it a try. When I opened up the package, everything was good until I spotted the bleeding of colors onto the white areas. Another thing to keep in mind is that there are two straps to secure each part of the tunnel to the tent and ball pit but that is not enough to keep the balls inside. My main concern is that the straps will break eventually. There could be an option for more colors as well!
customer_reviews.author: Yao

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Somewhat false advertising.
customer_reviews.text: Item just arrived. Expected a much bigger box. First thought was that maybe the balls for the ball pit would come separate. Reread the description (which could have changed since I ordered it), now says balls not included. Picture shows otherwise. Item for sale says 6-piece, container that came in mail says 5 piece. Disappointment is my best description for this item. Not what I expected. May have ruined the present that I wanted for my nephew. Update: on day 3 of use, the nylon on the ball pit ripped. So the structural wire is now sticking out. Not the safest product
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth briano

customer_reviews.title: Broke and flimsy!
customer_reviews.text: Initially my kids loved it but it broke within the hour of them running back and forth. It was a great idea that failed
customer_reviews.author: Jamie garrett

customer_reviews.title: Didn't receive 6 pcs, only 3. False advertisement.
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves it but the description says 6pcs set and only received 3. Feels like it's false advertisement. Would like to receive my other two pieces that I paid more for. If the carrying case is what made it cost $10 more you can have the case and send me my money back. Or you can send me my other two pieces please and thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This looks like a great product
customer_reviews.text: This looks like a great product, but we received it in the mail and the order was wrong. We paid for the 6 piece with two tents and two tunnels with ball pit and we received the 3 piece with 1 of each item. Will raise my review if this order gets corrected.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: This is VERY cheaply made and smells like mildew.
customer_reviews.text: This is VERY cheaply made and smells like mildew...but my grandkids love it. I have had to resew the little ties on several times that you use to attach the components to each other. It's great for long winter days when outside play isn't an option. They are 1 and 3 years old. I had to watch the videos on how to fold up the tube. The sides are very flexible so the kids can crawl over them into the ball pit and the sides will simply spring back up.
customer_reviews.author: starma58

customer_reviews.title: only for one child as a time
customer_reviews.text: We ended up returning this product because it did not meet any of our needs. Our son was turning one and we invited a bunch of his friends to come play. when we got the tent set it was way to small so we needed to order something larger for all the kids to enjoy. if you only have one small child then this might be fun, but we could not get more than 1 layer of ball pit balls in with out the rest spilling out.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: This product came in yesterday and my husband and I were so excited to put it up. I thought the product would be relatively small and was very surprised at how big these pieces are (we aren't good about measuring before ordering). My kids are in absolute love with this product, it's fun for hours for them. What's nice is you don't have to have all of the pieces out at once. I am so happy we purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids
customer_reviews.text: Fairly small for an adult to fit through the tunnels but, is very large once put together. Area space it takes up is large. This is because the tunnels are like 6ft long and you connect all the pieces with the tunnels. Don't think it came with balls but I had about 600 kiddy balls from previous play places. It is ok to leave outside overnight wouldn't recommend. Not in the rain or it will be destroyed.
customer_reviews.author: wisp588

customer_reviews.title: You get what you paid for
customer_reviews.text: It's really cheaply made, but my kids like it. I got it on sale, which is really the only reason I've kept it. Their customer service doesn't even exist. I tried to email them and it failed to send because the email listed on their website is invalid. Every tent and tunnel has threads sticking out and unraveling everywhere. The quality is horrendous but my two toddlers don't mind.
customer_reviews.author: michelletmommyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Not too impressed
customer_reviews.text: It is flimsy. The metal that provides the structure of it is so thin. My one year old easy bends it. It collapses very easily because of that too. The plastic parts are thin too. It is more for ages 5 and below. A 6yo would enjoy it but maybe too rough on it. Surprisingly it hasn't ripped yet after a month. The tents are small. Enough for one or 2 kids.
customer_reviews.author: blah blah

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: Literally the best thing I’ve ever invested in. This was the GREATEST Christmas present for my toddler, and my 7 year old nephew loves it just as much. It’s very flimsy & flexible, as it should be, yet it’s still very durable. My son plays with this more than he plays with any other toy. It’s MUCH bigger than I expected, but you can very easily disconnect and reconnect pieces to make it smaller/larger.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Get this one. Affordable and toddlernado proof.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a solution to our Covid-19 quarantine with a 1 year old and a 3 year old. It was barely out of the box (still folded) and they started losing their minds. They’re zooming through the tunnels and love pulling the sides down and letting them snap back into place. I wish it wasn’t quite so flimsy but mostly because my kids are bulldozers. Don’t mistake flimsy for cheap, it’s certainly durable!
customer_reviews.author: AbbyH

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my 2 year old niece to play with when she comes over. She absolutely loved it. She didn't quite understand what the tunnels were for, but it's definitely something she can enjoy all summer and then some! Th only problem I had was folding each part back to fit in the small carrying case that it came in. Also I wish the product came with balls for the ball pit. But like I said my niece LOVES it and in the end that's all that matters
customer_reviews.author: Elena Villalobos

customer_reviews.title: Great indoor/outdoor toy
customer_reviews.text: Just got this in today and set it up right away. My 13 year old took charge and set it up. She said it was extremely easy to set up. My 2 year old loves crawling through the tunnels. The ball pit area is his favorite place to play. We live in Wisconsin so plan to bring it inside during the winter and I know it will get a ton of use. Highly recommend this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Lorry mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Play Gym for young children
customer_reviews.text: So much fun for my one year old. It is so easy to assemble. She loves to crawl through the tunnels and bring toys in the end pieces. The center cube is great to play peek a boo with all of the cut outs. It's not the most sturdy, but the money, its a great deal It does take up a sizable amount of my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Great product, my kids love it. We added a few pieces from the Ikea collection, you can see how it compares to the size of the Playz tents. Unboxing and installing is a breeze, the flaps seem a bit flimsy and I can definitely forsee ripping tabs in the future. However, I would buy it again regardless.
customer_reviews.author: bl4ckh4t

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun but ripped the first time we used it
customer_reviews.text: My boys LOVE this and it's a great rainy day toy that doesn't take up a lot of space when stored. However, the first time we used it one of the connecting ties ripped. Still totally usable but disappointing it didn't last past one play without getting damaged. I'd still buy it again but I'll probably not tie it together to keep it from ripping.
customer_reviews.author: K. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this play tent. I was worried that my extremely tall 4-year-old would be too big for it or that it would be too flimsy for him and he would break it but that is not the case. I can see him having fun with this for several more years. I put 150 balls in and it could definitely use more. I love that it came in a carrying case for easy storage. I also like the fact that the ball pit and the one tent room have doors to close so he can play with it separately if he wanted. Overall, I think it is a great play tent.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Schaeffer

customer_reviews.title: nice little play tent to keep kiddos occupied
customer_reviews.text: i like that this tent can be used together or apart. the two tunnels are nice that you can see through the top. the ball pit is cute and needs lots of balls to get it somewhat full, we used 400 and its only covering the bottom. my kiddos would like more! its a little hard to tie each piece together as each side has a loop and two strings, but it does stay together when they are crawling through it.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki’s Childcare

customer_reviews.title: For the price, it's great, but...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this thing is great for 2-6 year-olds. The only problems are that you have to buy your own balls. Take it from me, a bag of 200 balls is not enough to fill the pit and satisfy a small child's expectations. Still, once the disappointment passes, they will have fun and will want to have you bring it out all the time to reassemble it in different configurations. Maybe I shouldn't have called it a ball pit in the first place....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its good for younger than 2 years old kids
customer_reviews.text: The seller provided great service but the product itself was very disappointing, it is really flimsy and the tunnel connections aren't very good, you just tie each end it don't seal the tunnel. I think its ok for a really young kid. I have my 3 year old he liked it but it was still flimsy for him, than add a 4 and a 7 year old boys, they all liked it but its not made for such use.
customer_reviews.author: CyberLifeBlock

customer_reviews.title: Great for the little one
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the little one. It's easy to put together or put away. Sturdy enough to withstand him crawling through it or laying off to the side. One of the tents does have a slight issue with one side, but it's really not severe enough to prevent the performance of the product. Overall, great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Stockwell

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for kids birthday, waited long and came in disappointment. It's flawed on the connection part, like attached images, connected ties on tunnel and tent are at different position. One is at top and bottom, another one is at left and right. Can't really tie the tunnel with the tent together. I'm still keeping it because don't wanna miss babys day.
customer_reviews.author: Maisie

customer_reviews.title: Flimzy material
customer_reviews.text: It was a joy to watch the grandchild play in it. I wish the tubes were bigger in diameter. Not for much bigger than toddlers. Just a side not, these things fold like hunting blinds, so I was an expert at folding them. The directions for putting them back in have a bit to be desired.
customer_reviews.author: salvatore raber

customer_reviews.title: Great inside or Outside Activity Toy
customer_reviews.text: I love this toy. This is the second one I've purchased. I purchased this one for my 2 and 4yr old grandsons. They spend hours playing with this 5 -Piece Kids Play Tents Crawl Tunnels and Ball Pit Popup Bounce Playhouse Tent with Basketball. Assemble in two minutes...easy peasy! You can choose to use all 5 pieces or reduce the size and only use a few of the pieces. It's great!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Patton

customer_reviews.title: Fun for Kids but doesnt stay together
customer_reviews.text: unfortunately one of the tie tabs came melted which was weird. I was not able to tie one of the tunnels to the tent. I am planning on returning the product. I ordered 1000 balls to go with it which I feel is a good amount. Hopefully the next ball pit I get will be better.
customer_reviews.author: andrea shearer

customer_reviews.title: Fun play space for kids
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this back in September but didn't open it until January. One of the metal rings inside the tent was kinked and thus permanently deformed. I waited too long to request a replacement and it still functions as a play space for my kids. Would order again. Only knocked off 1 star because of damage
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun
customer_reviews.text: I think its a good time for my daughter. Just wish that the Middle joining square piece had flaps for the tunnel holes that you are not using so that you can keep it closed. Also wish that the tunnels connect with more than two ties. Maybe four tie offs, one for each side. Other than that it is a lot of fun for our daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Harris

customer_reviews.title: 2 pieces missing in the so called 6-piece kit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 6-piece but only received 3 pieces. Here's the description: ‣ 1 x Triangular Play Tent: 40” Height – 44” Diagonal Base Width - $20 VALUE! ‣ 1 x Square Play Tent: 31” Height – 38” Diagonal Base Width - $20 VALUE! ‣ 2 x Tunnel: 42” Length – 19” Diameter - $30 VALUE! ‣ 1 x Ball Pit w/ Hoop: 18” Base Height – 32” Hoop Height – 45” Width - $25 VALUE! ‣ 1 x Lightweight, Compact Zipper Carrying Case – 20” Width - $10 VALUE! ‣ 1 x Instructions What were actually delivered: 1x tunnel 1x triangle tent 1x ball pit 1x carry case So where are the other tunnel and the square tent?
customer_reviews.author: Brina

customer_reviews.title: Bought the six piece on sale, received the three ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought the six piece on sale, received the three piece. It was 67% off, so if I return it, I get 30 back which won't buy the six piece now or even the three piece. Letdown.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps an 11 month old crawler content and happy
customer_reviews.text: This 5 piece play set is perfect to keep my 11 month old grandson occupied and happy! I even sent 1 tunnel home for him to use there. It's easy to fold and store in between his visits to my home. I bought the Click N Play 200 ball set and it just covers the bottom of the ball pit. That's enough balls for an 11 month old but I will add another bag as he gets bigger. I know he will get lots of use out of this!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Will keep kids busy for HOURS!!
customer_reviews.text: My kids- ages 2 and 5- were having birthdays, and we thought to buy them this awesome set as a joint gift for their room. They never come out of their room now!!! 🤣 We did end up ordering balls for the ball pit, but my oldest also puts all the stuffed animals in the pit at the end of the day. What?! It keeps them occupied for hours, AND they clean up their room??! We definitely love it, and while not everyone has room in the house for this, it could work anywhere- daycare, play room, outside covered area, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best present
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 10 month old for Christmas. Omg yes! She loves this!!! Love the different parts so I can choose how many to assemble. Sides aren’t very strong so if u have a super little one they won’t be able to stand against it
customer_reviews.author: Kaylab

customer_reviews.title: The material used in this product doesn't have a good quality. The steel would hurt your baby
customer_reviews.text: The material used in this product doesn't have a good quality. The steel would hurt your baby, pay attention on that. I put a blanket underneath the tunnel in order to ensure the safety for my little girl when she was crawling through the tunnel
customer_reviews.author: Sammantha

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun. Takes up lots of space.
customer_reviews.text: It's big. Very big. If you plan to use the whole set, it will take up a lot of space. Our child loves it. We bought the balls for the ball pit and it works out great. It's pretty durable. The only reason for 4 stars is some of the parts are a little tricky to pack away. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tent with the ball pit attached to it I purchased this for my twins for their second birthday and they absolutely loved it when I unwrapped it to set it up was so easy it just automatically formulates itself perfectly the folding part was a little difficult I had to go to YouTube to see how to fold it back that was difficult but it’s not a dealbreaker beyond that this is the best creation for my little babies to play indoor and have fun
customer_reviews.author: Domonique Simms

customer_reviews.title: Served its Purpose
customer_reviews.text: The product served its for my sons birthday party. However, It's not very sturdy. It doesn't attach as effectively as described. It's also doesn't fold as easy as described and we had to force it into it's holding bag.
customer_reviews.author: Shaunda

customer_reviews.title: Fun, durable, and easy
customer_reviews.text: We still love this play-set. I love that it folds into it's case and my three kids love that it's big enough for all three of them and their stuffed animals. They are pretty rough with it and after many hours of play there is only a small tear in the mesh of one tent. Folding a couple of them is tricky, but it still takes only a few minutes each time.
customer_reviews.author: Amber P.

customer_reviews.title: Tot approved!
customer_reviews.text: My one year old loves this! I love how easy it is to customize. I change it up every few weeks and it’s pretty fun. I have it indoor and haven’t tried it outdoor (because of the weather) but I’m sure it’ll hold well under the elements. The travel bag is a nice touch! Wish it came with some ball pit balls though
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Gail

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money. Not durable.
customer_reviews.text: I am very unhappy with the quality of this item. I bought this for a 1 year this year for Christmas and he has only played with it inside 3 times and it is already coming apart. The bottom of all three pieces is coming apart at the seams. It is advertised to be able to play outside in it but there is no way that is durable enough to withstand playing outside. I am very disappoint and my 1 year old will also be very disappoint when we have to throw it away because it is coming apart. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: and ball pit are easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The tent, tunnel, and ball pit are easy to assemble. The folding back-up to fit into its carrying case takes a few tries to get it right, especially with the ball pit as the basketball net portion can be hard to maneuver. The metal wires in the crawl through tunnel are a little rough on the knees but my son doesn't seem to mind. I have not had any issues with tearing but the fabric is pretty light and if your child played too rough, may have the potential to rip. Overall, my 16 month old son absolutely loves playing with this set and for the price I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter on her first birthday. She loves it and is having a blast crawling through all the pieces. A few of the pieces are a bit tricky to fold back into it's original package, but I have found it easier to just collapse them and store the pieces not in use behind our chair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: a lot bigger than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my one year old's christmas gift. I opened it up and took it out of the packaging tote bag it came in and set it up to see how big it was. I was very impressed with the size for the price, I am sure he is going to love playing in it, Only thing I was not thrilled over was that I found it a little difficult to fold, as the instructions did not do much other than show pictures that were not the greatest. Also part of the seam tore while trying to fold it :( Other than that this product is great!
customer_reviews.author: Sara vrooman

customer_reviews.title: Deffentily made for babies/toddlers not older kids
customer_reviews.text: Loved how big it is perfect for a big family! Isnt very sturdy though. Gets the job done the kids love it, so do we for the most part. The sides of the pit are very flimsy, the metal peaces on the inside that holds it up came apart with in minutes. But its not a hard fix. Would hilly recommend not using the ties to hold the tunnel peaces to the cube and pit unless you want umm torn off.
customer_reviews.author: Elicia and Russell Walker

customer_reviews.title: Save yourself, don't do it
customer_reviews.text: No, so much no. Not sturdy whatsoever. The tubes don't connect properly , the walls of the ballpit collapse under the slightest touch, balls goes everywhere. Unless you want to spend the rest of your life finding balls everywhere around your house, don't do it.
customer_reviews.author: Ian and Jenny from AZ

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: It's large and simple to configure/assemble. I would not recommend as an outside play toy because I don't think it would hold up very well, but on carpet it's super fun for toddlers and a great way to interact with your little ones. Taking it down was quite easy and just an FYI we bought a total of 800 balls which sounds like a lot, but was pretty much the right amount.
customer_reviews.author: george couts

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: A little bigger than I expected but awesome! The cube has a small tear but I think it’ll be ok. Baby is already enjoying it. Of course the balls were supposed to be here today too but didn’t come.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin warren

customer_reviews.title: Totally recommend
customer_reviews.text: A very very good toy. I,ve used it in two small parties and kids love it. It is very easy to assemble but the folding instructions are not very clear, so I still have trouble to fit everything in the bag. Get for entertaining. I feel its a little fragile but maybe I am just judging it by its materials.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: not a good experience
customer_reviews.text: The order arrived with only two pieces. I did not receive the ball pit that comes with it. Flimsy as well not great quality. Would not order again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The kids love it, but the various parts DO NOT FIT ...
customer_reviews.text: The kids love it, but the various parts DO NOT FIT TOGETHER. You cannot make it look like the picture due to the misalignment of the connective straps with the tunnel segments. Thankfully, you can still connect everything into a different configuration that DOES work.
customer_reviews.author: josh hockman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for toddler!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! We were at a birthday party where they had one and my toddler loved it so much that we decided to get our own and it's great. He loves it so much and spends hours playing.
customer_reviews.author: LinIsCrazy

customer_reviews.title: Missing half of the item
customer_reviews.text: Received half the product. Missing a tunnel and the middle square. I was not able to return in the allowed time frame so I got stuck with half the product at full price. Very disappointed. I paid this much because of all the pieces and didn’t receive them.
customer_reviews.author: Julz

customer_reviews.title: Not 6 pieces, missing the box tent.
customer_reviews.text: The little one likes it so I don’t have the hart to return it but it is missing the box tent. This is not a 6 piece set, the Amazon description is miss leading, it clearly says on the case it’s only 5 pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Eh.
customer_reviews.text: Ok for the money. Wire rips through easily. Ties to connect peices not in the right places so you can’t tie together which is dumb.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Cruickshank

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my daughters first birthday, she loves it! However she climbs right out of the ball pit by smashing down the walls and spilling the balls out, so watch your kids while they're playing. It is big so watch the dimensions
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Huffman

customer_reviews.title: Play time is all that matters! Motor skills make  kids great!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! Is all my little boy wanted. He was so happy celebrating his first Birthday with his friends and family. My baby enjoyed every min and will continue for a few years. Now all the kids come to our house to play. This has proven to be a great purchase. I love the colors and the flexibility. Thank you for having these.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Anderson

customer_reviews.title: what is the appropriate age?
customer_reviews.text: Nothing on the Amazon page indicated a minimum age, but when the product arrived at my home it shows not suitable for children under 36 months due to small choking hazards. I bought this for my 1 year old grandson and has had fun with it. I don't see any small choking hazards. I'm just a little confused on what is the appropriate age.
customer_reviews.author: RBF

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this!!! When it's all put together it's quite large so we rotate out the pieces so it's different every few times for our little one.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Not what is advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as a 6 piece product, but when arrived, was only 3. The first picture on the product with the tent, one tunnel and pit is all you get. There is no square connector or extra tunnel. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: TheFoodGuardian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: We set this up at our baby’s birthday party to keep him and his friends entertained. It totally did it’s job. However we could never figure out how to refold one of the tents. No big deal. Still love it. Going to use it to play outside this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Easy Setup
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 2 year old and she loves it. It's easy to setup, a little complicated to fold up but doable. It's a little flimsier than I expected, but probably for the best. It would be nice if there was a zipper or something for sturdy to connect the pieces together instead of just strings.
customer_reviews.author: NoBrakes

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived with holes in it. I will most likely return. I am very disappointed. This is way too expensive. Balls are not included but, I was aware of that. The quality is poor. The thread is coming off. The material is thin and looks like it will fall apart easily. It is difficult to fold back up. This is definitely not worth the price!!! It is cheaply made. It doesn’t look like it will last long.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Loved by all ages
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 1 year old for his birthday. He loves it, right along with my 2 and 9 year old. I could not even get it all set up before they were climbing inside of it ready to play. The balls are a little smaller than other balls that I have but being that it is 500 balls I am glad they are a little smaller. The sections are held together with ties so I wish it was a little more secure, but it has not been a problem thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandkids, they loved it. UPDATE after 3 months my daughter-inlaw said that it was tearing up and that the wires were coming through the material.
customer_reviews.author: STEVE L JONES

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely an amazing play set. I am very happy with this purchase, it's a really big product able to fit a lot of kids. Very sturdy (get the warranty just in case) very easy to assemble and it away. I'm glad I went with this instead of a bulky plastic play set, this is so easy to fold up and put away. The best part you can buy pieces to add to it for more fun. 500 balls would be a good start with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor McMillian

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this gift, it is quit large so If you dont have a lot of room In your house i wouldn't recommend. Also it does NOT come with the balls, it does say in the description, but I just assumed it did and didnt read into the details. Other then that it's a good present for a little kid.
customer_reviews.author: Ksmith

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: Cool idea. But the straps that you have to tie on the sides didnt last a weekend with a 3 and 2 year old crawling through. They have already came apart on one side so we turned the middle one to a different side where im sure the two nylon hook holes that you put the string through to tie the tunnel to will eventually break.
customer_reviews.author: David Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my two year old son and he has a great time playing in this tent/tunnel set. We use it in the backyard and indoors. Even our pets (cat & small dog) join in on the fun.
customer_reviews.author: Tali

customer_reviews.title: Go for a better quality
customer_reviews.text: The overall concept is great. I bought 2 one for a gift and one for my child. I pulled mine out and the strings to tie it to the ball pit ripped instantly.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Rinehart

customer_reviews.title: Little one loves it, but...
customer_reviews.text: We just got his today and assembled it for our our 10 month old. He loved crawling around in it! Easy to fold up to store. Only complaint is the colors of the dots seemed to have bled onto the white. Blotches of yellow and red all over. Bit disappointed with that part.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Burns

customer_reviews.title: I paid full price for a USED item
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived used. It has a stain in the bottom of the ball pit portion with the basket ball net. The tubes can’t be succeed to the ball pit because the strap to secure it is missing, there are loose threads where it should be. Very disappointed! I paid full price for a USED item.
customer_reviews.author: Rolonda

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the toy, but it doesn't come with the balls (and they're spendy)
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old adores this toy. She spends so much time in this little ball pit and loves to make baskets. I only put 4 stars because it doesn't come with the balls, and they ended up costing as much as the toy itself. Wah, wah! Still worth it if you're willing to pay double the price to have the whole package.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it but flawed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daycare. The kids love it! It was just what we wanted. But it can with two small holes on the bottom of the ball pit. I needed it the next day so I couldn’t return it. Not sure how long it will last with the holes in it. I still can’t figure out how to fold it back up.
customer_reviews.author: JanKim24

customer_reviews.title: Fun Playset for our Grandson
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson loves this playset but the wires that hold the playset out are sticking out now and he has only had it three months. Need to have better sewing or fastening to make sure that this does not happen as it could be dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Nowack

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed in this as my 10 mo old made his ...
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed in this as my 10 mo old made his first pass through the tunnel the small elastic pop off & disconnected the two.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Soele

customer_reviews.title: Easy to tear, not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: all mesh has a hole or torn from the nylon. the smallest amount of pressure from anything with an edge will pop a hole or tear it. collapses easily while playing inside if you dont move slowly. we love the concept of toy, but a more durable re design is much needed
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Fun for 14 month old
customer_reviews.text: My 14 month old loves it! Easy to set up and take down, does take up quite a lot of space when it’s fully up.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin McBee

customer_reviews.title: Smile Alert
customer_reviews.text: My 2 1/2 year old foster grandson smiled more than I’ve seen him smile since he was placed with my daughter and son in law. There are so many different ways to play in it. It definitely needs two bags of balls for a total of 400 balls. Had I known, I would have bought them at the discounted rate for 400 balls.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Alico

customer_reviews.title: Kiddos love it!
customer_reviews.text: The kiddos love it! I wish there was an option for it to come with balls, but they love playing with it even without the balls.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Nephews loved
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put up and together. Three nephews had a blast. Not so easy to fold back down and the directions were written by magicians that skipped a few steps...there is loops to use stakes for outdoor use, which you will need so lightweight it blows over easy.
customer_reviews.author: ron zietz

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: My kid absolutely loved it, the sturdiness was to be expected due to its compact folding. Easy to pop up and set up. Folding the assembled product isn't the fastest and easiest thing until you've done it a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Gnomeonmeth

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up, compact to store.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson's first birthday. All 4 grandkids are having a blast. My son, who was not thrilled when I told him what I ordered, even afmitted thiswas a good purchase. We love how easy it is to set up and how small it folds up.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Jones

customer_reviews.title: hours of smiles
customer_reviews.text: The kids made us set it up right away after opening gifts it was the first thing they wanted to play with. They didn't even go to any other toys, but spent hours of smiles playing in this. I purchased 400 balls with it as well, and it was perfect! The kids are 3 and 5 and honestly my 5 year old loved it more than the 3 year old even I'd say...tubes, tents and ball pit...they loved it all.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Doe

product_meta.title: Playz 5-Piece Kids Play Tents Crawl Tunnels and Ball Pit Popup Bounce Playhouse Tent with Basketball Hoop for Indoor and Outdoor Use with Red Carrying Case
product_meta.description:
DOZENS OF DIFFERENT WAYS TO PLAY
The tent, tunnel, & ball pit are folded separately & packaged inside a compact zipper storage case with handle. You can use them in multiple ways:

1) Use the tent on its own as a castle or playhouse.
2) Use the tunnel by itself for kids to crawl through.
3) Fill the ball pit with hundreds of balls & let them jump & play basketball.
4) Combine the tunnel with the tent as an extension.
5) Combine the tunnel with the ball pit.
6) Combine all 3 pieces for a richer & more playful experience, especially when the friends come over! 

What’s Inside the Package?
‣ 1 x Triangular Play Tent: 40” Height – 44” Diagonal Base Width - $20 VALUE!
‣ 1 x Square Play Tent: 31” Height – 38” Diagonal Base Width - $20 VALUE!
‣ 2 x Tunnel: 42” Length – 19” Diameter - $30 VALUE!
‣ 1 x Ball Pit w/ Hoop: 18” Base Height – 32” Hoop Height – 45” Width - $25 VALUE!
‣ 1 x Lightweight, Compact Zipper Carrying Case – 20” Width - $10 VALUE!
‣ 1 x Instructions

TOTAL VALUE OF $105!
You will be making a wise financial choice by choosing our product.
You will rest at ease knowing your kids are playing in a safe environment that is tested to be free of LEAD, LATEX, PHTHALATES, & BPA.
You will give the kids an extremely fun toy that will keep them occupied for hours.
You can now listen to a few extra hours of joy & laughter everyday while giving yourself some time to relax. Lets face it, being a parent or babysitter is not easy!

We truly care about customer service & want to deliver a great overall experience. 100% Money Back Guarantee!
feature_bullets: LOVE & LAUGHTER - Children love this deluxe 6pc playhouse dream tent, crawl tunnel & basketball pit with hoop. Their imaginations will come alive as they enjoy endless hours of fun crawling & playing in the playland ball pit.
BABY APPROVED - Soft fabric & breathable mesh design allows for a safe & environmental friendly playground for the kids. Playz toys meet & exceed all USA CPSC Toy Safety Guidelines.

SIMPLE & STURDY - Easy to setup & foldable with a lightweight zipper carrying bag for convenient storage. The two tunnels, triangle tent, cube tent, & ball pit can be used all together or combined into several sets. ** PLAY PIT BALLS NOT INCLUDED **

MULTIPURPOSE - Use it at parties, picnics, backyard BBQs, parks, playgrounds, day care, school, carnivals, sleepovers, or simply keep it in the playroom at home! Great for dogs, cats, and pets as well!
100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE - Do your research! When you purchase a Playz product, you know the premium quality you will get. We care about ours kids, so don't settle for anything but the best!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,575 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
